Level Devil â€“ The Troll Platformer That Breaks the Rules

Level Devil looks like a simple platformerâ€¦ until the ground gives way, spikes shoot out, and ceilings collapse without warning! Your mission is to collect keys and reach the doorâ€”but the game will do everything it can to stop you.

What is Level Devil?

Level Devil is a 2D troll-platformer designed to test not just your reflexes, but also your patience. Every level is filled with hidden traps that trigger at the worst possible times, forcing players to adapt quickly or restart in frustration. Some versions even include a 2-player mode, where you can sabotage each other with traps for maximum chaos.

How to Play Level Devil?

  • Move & Jump: Use WASD or arrow keys to run and jump through each level.
  • Collect Keys: Find and grab the key to unlock the exit door.
  • Avoid Traps: Spikes, pits, collapsing floors, and surprise hazards lurk everywhere.
  • Reach the Exit: Survive the chaos and make it to the door.

Why Play Level Devil Unblocked?

Level Devil Unblocked brings pure unpredictability to your browser. With no downloads required, you can jump in anywhereâ€”school, work, or homeâ€”and challenge yourself against one of the most unfair platformers ever made.

Key Features

  • Troll Gameplay: Expect the unexpectedâ€”every jump could be a trap.
  • Classic Platforming: Run, jump, and dodge your way to victory.
  • Unpredictable Levels: Hazards appear without warning for maximum chaos.
  • 2-Player Mode: Trigger traps for (or against) your friends.
  • Unblocked Fun: Play instantly online without restrictions.

Can You Outsmart the Devil?
